name: RENPHO Body Measuring Tape, Smart Tape Measure for Weight Loss, Bluetooth Fitness Equipment with App, Measuring Waist, Hip, Bust, Arms, Muscle Gain, Retractable, 60in /150cm, White
short_description: Smart Tape Measure. If you want your body measurements progress showing for graphing over time, this is the best smart body measuring tape for you; complete with fully integrated Renpho Health App connectivity. Easy to read measuring tape for body measurements. Reading the small numbers and lines on a traditional measuring tool is difficult and may lead to inaccuracy. Our large LCD screen and instant measurement saving via the App allows you to skip the hassle and avoid any error! Perfect body tape for personal professional trainers work out use. Multifunctional. Whether you are a fitness enthusiast, gaining more muscle, slimming down, or even an expecting mother-to-be... it has never been easier to track your body change trends with this Renpho tape measure body measuring tape. Retractable easy-lock hook. With this innovative smart body measuring tape, you no longer require others for help while measuring. Our easy-lock design allows you to measure your body circumference quickly on your own. Compact and portable double sided body tape with inch/cm measurements. Renpho smart body measure tape is lightweight and compact, making it easy to carry in your gym bag or luggage, ensuring you can measure and track your body changes wherever you go. Multiple Profiles. This body tape measure supports multiple user profiles, making it convenient for households or families to use the same device to track their individual progress. Note: This tape measure does not measure body fat.

short_description: Easy to Read Body Measurement Tape: With increments as precise as 0.01in/0.1cm, Arboleaf's body measuring tape boasts a large LCD display for clear, precise readings. Plus, the body measuring tape for body measurements with instant measurement saving via the app, tracking your progress is effortless. Retractable Easy Lock & in/cm Units: The smart measuring tape for body allows for convenient measurements without assistance. With our easy-lock design, you can use the body measuring tape weight loss by yourself. It's more easier than loose sewing tape. Effortlessly switch between inches and centimeters by pressing and holding the 'M' button, ensuring simple and convenient operation Smart Body Measuring Tape & arboleaf App : Syncing with arboleaf, feelfit app, this smart tape measure tracks 12 key body areas and 6 customized parts, including biceps, calves, hips, thighs, waist, shoulders, bust, neck, and abdomen. Stay motivated with clear graphs. Whether you're on a weight loss journey, focusing on muscle gain, or improving your fitness, the smart body measuring tape makes tracking your body transformation easy. Portable and Convenient: The arboleaf digital body measuring tape is designed to be lightweight and compact, allowing you to effortlessly carry it in your gym bag or luggage. Wherever you go, you can easily measure and track your body changes on the go, ensuring you stay on top of your fitness goals. Full Body Measurements - 12 preset circumference you can record and you can add your own custom ones as well. The readings can be read from the digital display on the body measurement tape or on the app. A great tool and motiviator for anyone who is trying to either lose weight or gain muscle. Great way to track your progress and make sure you are staying on track. Fitness Tracking & Multi-User Support: Stay on top of your fitness journey with the arboleaf app, the body tape measure can accommodate an unlimited number of users. tracking progress wherever you are. Designed for families, bodybuilders, and fitness enthusiasts, this smart tape measure ensures everyone can monitor their health goals effortlessly.
